summary.span: 定义表示 UI 控件的组成部分或支持控件复合模型的类。

span.span: Defines classes that represent the component parts of UI controls, or otherwise support the control composition model.

summary.span: 此外，还定义控件模式（如对齐和选择）的接口。

span.span: Also defines interfaces for control patterns such as snapping and selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间文档仅包含投影不同于 WinRT 类型 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 类型的 .NET 投影。This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. 若要查看此命名空间的完整类型列表，请参见 UWP API 参考中的 " [Windows](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.controls.primitives) "。To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.controls.primitives) in the UWP API reference.
